item.title: The future of Riot‚Äôs VALORANT is built on UE5

item.description:
Riot Games is upgrading VALORANT from Unreal Engine 4 to Unreal Engine 5. Marcus Reid explains that this shift aims to enhance gameplay and graphics, ensuring the game remains competitive and appealing. item.title: UE5 Automotive Cinematic
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöó‚ú® Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) showcases its potential in automotive cinematics. The article dives into the technical aspects and features that make UE5 a powerful tool for creating stunning visuals in the automotive industry. It highlights how real-time rendering and advanced lighting techniques enhance vehicle presentations. The use of UE5 allows for greater creativity and efficiency in producing automotive content. #UnrealEngine5 #AutomotiveCinematics #3DRendering #GameDevelopment #Innovation
